exceptions.summary: Thrown when the resolved type does not implement <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair`2}" />.

parameters.name: value
parameters.summary: An expression that represents the value to be serialized.

parameters.name: resolution
parameters.summary: The resolution to obtain type information from.

parameters.name: schema
parameters.summary: The schema to map to the type.

returns.summary:
A successful result if the resolution is a <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Resolution.MapResolution" /> and the schema
            is a <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.MapSchema" />; an unsuccessful result otherwise.

overloads.summary: Builds a map serializer for a type-schema pair.
